original_title: The Discreet Charm of the Hipster Class
overview: There are 10 million games in the naked city - board games, mind games, gender games, drinking games, video games, gaming the system, mating games, role-playing games, and games of chance. Each game provides us with a glimpse into our diversions - light and dark.
tagline: 10 million people, 19 players, 11 games, 1 city, 73 minutes.
title: The Discreet Charm of the Hipster Class
